# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a navigation view style represented by a view stack that only shows a single top view at a time.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationViewStyle/stack] to construct this style.
title: init()
